input.sentences: me and my friends went out to the beach .
we hung out and enjoyed the waves .
then we tried to get a good beach jump pick .
we jumped in the water and watched the sun go down .
output.sentences: Some friends went to the beach.
Lot of fun times jumping and acting crazy that day.
After several pictures, they both nailed the jump for the photo on the beach.
As the day ended, they enjoyed playing in the waves and watching the sun go down.
